Leo Danenkov

Designer of User Interfaces and Interactions for Virtual and Augmented Reality. Researching hypothesis to test ideas and build engaging prototypes.

Synesthesia

Immersive Virtual Reality experience designed for Meta platform exploring embodiement into a Synesthete through the eyes of Wassily Kandinsky.

Nanome

Designed Immersive Virtual and Augmented Reality User Interfaces. Conducted User Research Studies to create immersive application workflows for Drug Discovery and Design.

Volumetrics.io

Prototyped and Engineered WebXR experiences utilizing three.js and mr.js. Designed and implemented prototypes featuring latest developments in WebXR.

UX/UI Design

Collaborated with Designers and Developers crafting User Interfaces and Interactions for Web and Mobile. Lead User Research Studies, mapped User Journeys, Qualitative and Quantitative feedback data processing.

3D Visualization

Visualized 2D plans with Autocad software and novel 3D rendering techniques. Designed custom material libraries, 3d modelled furniture and 3D plans. Enhanced renders with Photoshop for Post Production.
